name: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox spirit, dreams of becoming the Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village.

name: Death Note
description: Light Yagami discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a deadly game of wits with a genius detective.

name: Attack on Titan
description: In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures, Eren Yeager and his friends join the fight for survival.

name: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew search for the ultimate treasure, the One Piece, in a world of adventure and danger.

name: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where most people have superpowers, a young boy named Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a hero despite being born without any powers.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Tanjiro Kamado, a young boy turned demon slayer, seeks revenge against the demons who slaughtered his family and turned his sister into one.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Teenagers pilot giant robots to protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels in this mecha anime with psychological depth.

name: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunters Spike Spiegel and Jet Black travel through space in the year 2071, pursuing criminals and facing their own pasts.

name: Sword Art Online
description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must clear the game's levels to escape, while dealing with the consequences of their actions.

name: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, seeks a worthy adversary in a world filled with powerful monsters and heroes.

name: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends accidentally discover a way to send messages to the past, leading to a series of time-traveling adventures and consequences.
